item.description:
Learn how to calm stress, reduce agravations, and the frustrations of everyday life. Mudras are yogic positions for your hands and fingers. They can be practiced while sitting, standing, lying down or in any other position and in any place. This gathering will incorporate music meditation. Inspired by Mudra: Yoga In Your Hands by Gertrud Hirschi. Presented by Myo-on.

From November to the first week of January, registration will be open for our most popular course, Buddhism 101 that explores the life of the historical Buddha and disciples, his teachings, the Eightfold Path, mindfulness and prayer, Zen and the Shin path. Visit our main web site for more details and sign up information. Open to beginners to intermediate.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
